name: SAMURAI-GHOST
description:
This action platformer features a samurai ghost, back from the depths of
the underworld. In a past war, Kagekiyo managed to defeat the shogun
Yoritomo and his clan. However, their evil spirits were not completely
destroyed, and now, in the world known as Dark Side, they seek the time
of their rebirth. In order to shatter those ambitions, Kagekiyo must
make his way across seven zones and head for “The Heart of the Darkside”
where Yoritomo lies in wait. Use spirit weapons to power up your sword
or other items, such as candles to recover health, and defeat the
endless hordes of enemies. Each zone is not only protected by a boss but
also includes demons as well as real samurai from 12th-century Japan!
Get ready for some intense one-on-one combat action!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
